title: Bug 4329: No results if searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
EB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results. The search should first try to get the Java element, and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select the desired package.
3. Use the search functionality within the dialog.
4. Notice that no search results are displayed.

Note: Searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
